result.reason: The 'Expand All' command currently only expands visible nodes when a filter is active, and this state is lost (reverted to pre-filter state) when the filter is cleared. The fix ensures that explicitly triggering 'Expand All' applies to all nodes and persists after the filter is removed.
result.approach: Add a `UserExpandAll` method to `ConnectionTree`. This method will call `ExpandAll()` and, if filtering is active, update the `_preFilterExpandedObjects` state variable to include all nodes in the tree (recursively) instead of the previous state. Update `ConnectionTreeWindow` to bind the 'Expand All' menu item to this new method.
